p: The hydro-ethanolic extract of air-dried powder of T. bovei (HETB) was obtained by maceration for 3 days using ethanol:water (70:30 v/ v) (1 g/10 mL), while the aqueous extract of air-dried powder T. bovei (AETB) (1 g/10 mL) was prepared by boiling in distilled water for 30 min and left to stand to cool down at 26 Â°C. The solutions were filtered by Sartorius 388 filter paper and the filtered extracts were employed for analyses.
